name: Emergency Water Landing
description:
Emergency Water Landing is a local multiplayer party game where a sinking aircraft is the least of your worries.
Commandeer high powered rescue rafts, while fighting to save passengers and launching them to their presumable safety.

• Knock passengers out of your opponents rafts, or nimbly avoid them
• Avoid hungry sharks, and other ill tempered creatures lurking below.

Sit back, relax and enjoy your flight.

2 to 4 PLAYERS (NO SINGLE PLAYER MODE)
Full Controller Support (NO KEYBOARD)
